PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02532012-03-01,  ,  ,  ,  IC
ActRadiocommunication Act
SubjectRadiocommunication Act (subsection 4(1) and paragraph 9(1)(b)) Exemption Order (Security, Safety and International Relations), No. 2012-1
PrecisRADIOCOMMUNICATION ACT (SUBSECTION 4(1) AND PARAGRAPH 9(1)(B)) EXEMPTION ORDER (SECURITY, SAFETY AND INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS), NO. 2012-1 - which exempts the RCMP from the application of this Act with respect to interfering with radiocommunication signals during the visit of the Prime Minister of Israel from March 2 to March 5, 2012.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0034 Publication Date: 2012-03-14
AttachmentsAttachment
